com.georgetsak.sorry.model.card

Interface Card

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardDirectional, CardEight, CardEleven, CardFive, CardFour, CardMove, CardOne, CardSeven, CardSorry, CardStart, CardTen, CardThree, CardTwelve, CardTwo

    public interface Card
    Contains the method signatures required for creating a Sorry! game card.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canAddPawn()
      Accessor: returns whether or not a player can exit a pawn from the start zone Postcondition: whether or not a player can exit a pawn from the start zone has been returned
      boolean drawAgain()
      Accessor: returns whether or not the player must draw another card Postcondition: whether or not the player must draw another card has been returned
      int getBackwardSteps()
      Accessor: returns the steps a pawn has to move backwards Postcondition: card's required backward steps have been returned
      int getForwardSteps()
      Accessor: returns the steps a pawn has to move forwards Postcondition: card's required forward steps have been returned
      boolean isEleven()
      Accessor: returns whether or not the card is an Eleven card Postcondition: whether or not the card is an Eleven card has been returned
      boolean isSorry()
      Accessor: returns whether or not the card is a Sorry card Postcondition: whether or not the card is a Sorry card has been returned
      boolean isSplit()
      Accessor: returns whether or not the steps on the card can be split between two pawns Postcondition: whether or not the steps on the card can be split between two pawns has been returned
